name: Madhur Tulsiani
content: Madhur Tulsiani's homepage Madhur Tulsiani Professor, Toyota Technological Institute at Chicago Professor, Department of Computer Science, University of Chicago (part-time appointment) <concatenation of mad and hurt> at ttic dot edu I am interested in Theoretical Computer Science, particularly in Complexity Theory. My research has been supported by NSF Career Award 1254044, NSF Award 1816372 and NSF Award 2326685. Brief bio: I did my bachelor’s in Computer Science at IIT Kanpur (2001-05) and a Ph.D. at UC Berkeley (2005-09) advised by the amazing Luca Trevisan. I was also a postdoc at the Institute for Advanced Study and Princeton University. Here’s a CV if you want to know more.
